Package info.oais.infomodel.interfaces.utility

Interface OaisIfTable

All Known Subinterfaces:
OaisIfProvenanceInformation, OaisIfTimeSeries
All Known Implementing Classes:
OaisIfTableRefImpl, OaisIfTimeSeriesRefImpl
public interface OaisIfTable
An interface useful for dealing with tabular information

  • Method Details

    • getRowCount

      long getRowCount()
      Find the number of rows in the table
      Returns:
      The number of rows in the table, or if this is not know then 0

    • getColumnCount

      int getColumnCount()
      Find the number of columns in the table
      Returns:
      number of columns in the table

    • getColumnName

      String getColumnName(int columnIndex)
      Get the names of a specified column in the table
      Parameters:
      columnIndex - The index (starting at zero) of the column required.
      Returns:
      The name of the column with the given index (starting at 0) in the table

    • getColumnClass

      Class<?> getColumnClass(int columnIndex)
      Get the Class of a specified column in the table
      Parameters:
      columnIndex - The index (starting at zero) of the column required.
      Returns:
      The class of the column with the given index (starting at 0) in the table

    • getValueAt

      Object getValueAt(long rowIndex, int columnIndex)
      Get the value of the cell at the given row and specified column in the table.
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - The index (starting at zero) of the row required.
      columnIndex - The index (starting at zero) of the column required.
      Returns:
      The value of the cell with the given index (starting at 0) of row and column. in the table

    • addColumn

      void addColumn(String colName, Class<?> colType)
      Adds a column to the model.
      Parameters:
      colName - the name of the new column
      colType - the class of the column

    • setValueAt

      void setValueAt(Object obj, long rowIndex, int columnIndex)
      Set the value of a cell
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - The index of the row of the cell
      columnIndex - The index of the column of the cell
      obj - The value of the cell - should match the class of the column
